title: Bloomberg Markets: Dave Wilson's Stock of the Day for Oct. 30
itunes:title: Bloomberg Markets: Dave Wilson's Stock of the Day for Oct. 30
description:
Bloomberg Markets with Carol Massar and Cory Johnson.\u0010\u0010GUEST:\u0010David Wilson\u0010Stocks Editor\u0010Bloomberg News\u0010Discussing his "Stock of the Day" DMC Global (BOOM). DMC Global Inc.'s shares rose to a three-year high as they rallied for a second day on well-received results. The maker of metal plates and explosive devices reported third-quarter earnings that were more than twice analysts' average estimate in a Bloomberg survey. Revenue beat projections by the widest margin in a decade.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
